archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0584
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As the owner of a service, I want to be able to easily receive and approve or deny change requests from a linked user that doesn't have permission to make changes without approval, so that I can stay in control of my services

properties.value: Does approval is triggered separatelly for different acitons for particular end user? for instance for change plan approval is needed and for setting the limit approval is not needed? Can owner manage it? Can end user initiate any action of subscription he uses? Parked for customer hierarchy workshop

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
